channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Kossi Akplaka
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Kossi Akplaka

item.title: Project 1: Housing price Estimator
item.description: Gather data on housing prices in New York from various sources, such as online real estate databases, government datasets, and real estate agents. Preprocess the data by removing missing values, outliers, and irrelevant variables. Transform the variables into numerical values and perform feature engineering. Build a machine learning model, such as a linear regression or random forest, that takes in the input variables and predicts the output variable of housing price.

item.title: Project 2: Heart Disease Prediction
item.description: Collect and preprocess relevant medical data, such as patient demographics, medical history, and diagnostic tests, from various sources such as electronic health records and medical journals. Explore and visualize the data, identifying any patterns or correlations between the input variables and the target variable of heart disease. Select and train a machine learning model, such as logistic regression or decision trees, using the preprocessed data to predict the presence or absence of heart disease.

item.title: About
item.description: As an entry-level data scientist, I am excited about the potential of data science to drive meaningful insights and positive impact. I have recently completed my degree in data science and have gained foundational skills in statistics, programming, and machine learning. Through my personal projects, I have developed expertise in data analysis, data visualization, and predictive modeling. I am particularly interested in the healthcare industry and am passionate about using data to improve patient outcomes and healthcare delivery.
